message: I feel like Convore is rather dark and dull when I use it for any length of time via it's web interface. I would love to see the background and some of the greys just lightened a couple of shades.
looks light and bright on my monitor (running Chrome on Mac Pro ViewSonic monitor).
ummm yeah me too, macbook air- safari
MacBook Pro and iMac both make this look dark.
It's not dark (for me) but I agree, it could do with a bit of "pizzazz" some time in the future
